title: Frontier giving away free Apple TV 4K to customers for ‘Fiber 2 Gig’ internet promo
content:
Frontier is running a new promotion for new customers purchasing its Fiber 2 Gig internet. When new customers subscribe, they will receive a free Apple TV 4K. In addition, new subscribers will also get three months of the Apple TV+ streaming service for free.

more…

The post Frontier giving away free Apple TV 4K to customers for ‘Fiber 2 Gig’ internet promo appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: When new customers subscribe to Frontier's Fiber 2 Gig internet, they will receive a free Apple TV 4K as part of its promotion.
